body.name: Conair 2-in-1 Handheld Steamer and Iron for Clothes, Turbo ExtremeSteam 1875W Garment Steamer and Clothing Iron,Black / Blue
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 13 mins
features: Turbo Handheld Steamer: This 2-in-1 steamer doubles as an iron to quickly and easily release wrinkles. Use vertically as a steamer or horizontally as an iron. Instantly smooth out wrinkles

Easy to Use: This freestanding steamer features 4 steam settings, 10-second heat-up & 8.5-ounce water tank for up to 10 minutes of continuous steam. Smart Sensor Safety Feature stops steam when placed on flat surface & starts steaming again when picked up

Bonus Accessories: Delicates Bonnet for fine fabrics, Creaser for perfect pleats & folds, 2-in-1 Silicone Band + Bristle Brush: Silicone Band pulls fabrics taut for better results and Bristle Brush ensures steam penetrates fibers even on heavy fabrics

Conair Fabric Steamers: Our garment steamers have earned the Good Housekeeping Seal and keep your clothing, upholstery, curtains and other home fabrics smooth and fresh. Check out entire line including handheld, upright and travel steamers
Innovative Garment Care: From fabric shavers and traditional irons to garment steamers, both handheld and full size, we make high-quality garment care accessories
body.description: Get fast results for all your steaming and ironing needs with the most powerful handheld steamer** and keep your clothes looking perfectly pressed and smelling fresh. Engineered with 1875 watts of power, the Turbo ExtremeSteam® Steam & Iron 2-in-1 with Turbo by Conair® is a high-heat, handheld garment steamer that doubles as an iron for vertical and horizontal use. It heats up almost instantly producing 40% more steam†, with a 62% larger steam surface for faster smoothing†. De-wrinkle and freshen clothing, curtains, linens, and more with 4 steam settings while effectively killing 99.9% of bacteria.* It also has the added smart sensor safety feature, which stops the steam when the steamer is placed on a flat surface and starts the steam again when it's picked up. With the ability to quickly press and refresh fabric, the versatility to convert to a dry iron, and all the accessories you’ll ever need, you can achieve flawlessly smooth, fresh-from-the-dry-cleaner results in no time! *Based on third party test report for efficacy on E. Coli when used in accordance with enclosed instructions. **Based on unit wattage of 1875 as of October 2020. †Compared to other similar Conair handheld steamers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far, the best steamer I've ever used. It did 3 blouses before it needed a refill. Easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heats fast, works great!!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to replace a small travel steamer. However, it was much bigger than expected so this is now my at-home steamer! It is a ton bigger than I thought, but the benefit is that it steams huge areas quickly!!It heats up almost immediately, and the various heat and steam settings make this adjustable to your needs.I haven't used the attachments for pleats or delicates yet but I like having the options.It has gotten out some stubborn wrinkles that I thought I was just destined to be stuck with on clothes after washing.So far, loving this steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars IT DOESN’T WORK.
reviews.reviewText: Bought it after watching some reviews on TikTok and got it delivered same day. I was super excited to test it out on the wrinkled curtains I just hung up. I go to test it out and when I hit the steam button, it sounded like it kept heating up over and over and NO STEAM came out. I read through the instructions and it says it will begin to steam once it senses it’s not on a flat surface. Held it at an angle for over two minutes and nothing. What a disappointment.EDIT:I sent it back and had it replaced. It must have been the one I had, but it works great! Happy with the how easy it is to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received this a couple of weeks ago and have already used it enough to be able to donate my iron and small steamer away, in order to save space in my small apartment. I tested it on a wrinkled linen shirt and I don't think that shirt has ever looked better. I also used it in the horizontal position to steam my mattress and pillows, and it did just great - not a leak in sight. Now to decide if I should give away my ironing board as well. It's too big for traveling tho, in my opinion.*UPDATE - after just a couple of weeks, unit began sputtering and leaving lots of big wet spots on my clothing, even when used vertically. Contacted Conair directly and the woman suggested I descale it by filling the chamber with a 50/50 solution of water and white vinegar, then let it steam vertically for a while. Did that and now it's back to working perfectly. Hadn't seen that tip anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is god send seriously, I hate ironing and I never tried any steam machines before. Was very skeptical on how effective it would be, there were many brands to try from but I went for a name brand that I know than trying some weird names. It is perfect, I don’t think I will ever have to iron anymore. It takes seconds to start working i just steam my clothes and within seconds ur ready to go. I didn’t honestly use any of the other attachments but it does the job for me.Update: a while into using this and it started spraying water all over the clothes, its like no steam comes out anymore just really hot water. Such a disappointment I really liked it when it worked, back to my old iron I guess!!!Update: after some research turns out it just needed cleaning, all it needed was add some vinegar and water to it and turn it on, let it work till all the water is steamed and voilà its back to functioning normal. Obviously this was a step needed every now and then, read about it before but for some reason couldn’t think that spitting out water means it needs cleaning. Still rocks! I am back in love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointing Performance - Water Leakage Ruins the Experience
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased the Conair 2-in-1 Handheld Steamer and Iron with high hopes of efficiently steaming and ironing my clothes. However, my experience with this product has been quite disappointing due to one major flaw: water leakage.From the moment I started using it, I noticed water bursting out of the steam vents, leaving my clothes damp and in need of rewashing. This issue completely defeats the purpose of having a steamer and iron combo, as it only adds unnecessary steps to my garment care routine.I have tried all the troubleshooting steps mentioned in the manual, including checking the water tank and adjusting the temperature, but the leakage problem persists. It is frustrating and time-consuming to constantly wipe down my clothes and surfaces to prevent water stains.Moreover, the water leakage poses a risk of damaging delicate fabrics, as it may leave watermarks or cause discoloration. It’s disheartening to spend money on a product that not only fails to deliver its promises but also creates additional problems.While I appreciate the convenience of having a 2-in-1 device, the consistent water leakage issue overshadows any benefits it may offer. I had expected better quality and performance from a reputable brand like Conair.I would strongly caution potential buyers who are considering this product. Unless Conair addresses and resolves the water leakage problem, I cannot recommend the Conair 2-in-1 Handheld Steamer and Iron for Clothes. It’s a regrettable purchase that fails to live up to expectations and leaves clothes wet instead of well-pressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely waste of money . I was excited to use it but it literally worked for 10 sec (I’m not exaggerating) before it stopped . I tried everything but it’s simply not working . Unfortunately I can’t even return it because due to my busy schedule I never opened it for over a month which is a mistake on my part . The conclusion is to always use the product immediately after delivery because it might be faulty and you would have to return it .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: Ease of use it the best thing. That is extremely important to me and it’s very simple to use. Great purchase!
Lo acabo de estrenar. Pero funciona de maravilla
Best purchase ever. I use it lots I need a tall hanging rack for easier steaming. Can touch up shirts pants sweaters etc quickly before going out

This steamer started off great. But after only 4 rounds of weekly use (just a few items each time) it no longer issues steam. Waste of money unfortunately.
